>
[Brutal Critical](/Feats.aspx?ID=5873) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 85 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Your critical hits are particularly devastating. On a critical hit with a melee Strike, add one extra damage die. This is in addition to any extra dice you gain if the weapon is [deadly](/Traits.aspx?ID=570) or [fatal](/Traits.aspx?ID=597). The target also takes [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) equal to two damage dice.
